reasoning: AHDS is a rare X-linked intellectual disability disorder caused by SLC16A2 mutations (monocarboxylate transporter 8 deficiency). Estimated incidence <0.01 per 100k live births based on case report frequency and population-based genetic studies. Fewer than 200 confirmed cases worldwide. Incidence data primarily from case reports rather than systematic epidemiological surveys.
source: Friesema EC et al. (2004). Association between mutations in a thyroid hormone transporter and severe X-linked psychomotor retardation. Lancet. 364(9443):1435-1437
